    • Method Detail

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String msgIn)
                             throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generates SHA-1 hash of string. Uses hash method with the OUT_HEX (no spaces) output format.
        Parameters:
        msgIn - String to be hashed.
        Returns:
        Hash of msg as hex character string.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String msgIn,
                                    int outFormat)
                             throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generates SHA-1 hash of string.
        Parameters:
        msgIn - String to be hashed.
        outFormat - Output format: OUT_HEX (0) for string of contiguous hex bytes; OUT_HEXW (1) for grouping hex bytes into groups of (4 byte / 8 character) words.
        Returns:
        Hash of msg as hex character string.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • getCharCode

        public static int getCharCode(byte[] str,
                              int index)
                       throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Returns the integer code of a char in a byte array.
        Parameters:
        str - byte array of characters.
        index - position of the character desired.
        Returns:
        integer code of such character.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
